Actions.Name: Cancel an agreement
Actions.Description: Cancels the agreement identified by agreementId in the path.

Actions.Name: Create an agreement from an uploaded document and send for signature (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation creates an agreement from a document uploaded in Adobe Sign and sends it for signature.

Actions.Name: Create an agreement from an uploaded document and send for signature
Actions.Description: This operation creates an agreement from a document uploaded in Adobe Sign and sends it for signature.

Actions.Name: Create an agreement from a library template and send for signature (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation creates an agreement from a template stored in the user's Adobe Sign library and sends it for signature.

Actions.Name: Create an agreement from a library template and send for signature
Actions.Description: This operation creates an agreement from a template stored in the user's Adobe Sign library and sends it for signature.

Actions.Name: Create an agreement from a document URL and send for signature (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation creates an agreement from a document uploaded in Adobe Sign and sends it for signature.

Actions.Name: Create an agreement from a document URL and send for signature
Actions.Description: This operation creates an agreement from a document uploaded in Adobe Sign and sends it for signature.

Actions.Name: Create a library template from an uploaded document (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation creates a template in Adobe Sign library from an uploaded document. Use this template for sending agreements.

Actions.Name: Create a library template from an uploaded document
Actions.Description: This operation creates a template in Adobe Sign library from an uploaded document. Use this template for sending agreements.

Actions.Name: Create a library template from a document URL (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation creates a template in Adobe Sign library from a document URL. Use this template for sending agreements

Actions.Name: Create a library template from a document URL
Actions.Description: This operation creates a template in Adobe Sign library from a document URL. Use this template for sending agreements

Actions.Name: Upload a document and get a document ID (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation uploads a document in your Adobe Sign account and returns a document ID for it. This document is temporarily stored in Adobe Sign and the document ID can be used for further operations like creating an agreement.

Actions.Name: Upload a document and get a document ID
Actions.Description: This operation uploads a document in your Adobe Sign account and returns a document ID for it. This document is temporarily stored in Adobe Sign and the document ID can be used for further operations like creating an agreement.

Actions.Name: When a new agreement is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a new agreement is created.

Actions.Name: When an agreement is sent to a participant
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when an agreement is sent to a participant.

Actions.Name: When an agreement workflow is completed successfully
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when an agreement workflow is completed successfully

Actions.Name: When the state of an agreement changes
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when the status of an agreement changes. Covers most common Agreement events such as creation, completion, etc.

Actions.Name: When an event occurs
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when an event occurs. Covers all Agreement, Mega Sign and Widget events.

Actions.Name: Get form field data of agreement (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Retrieves data entered into the interactive form fields of the agreement.

Actions.Name: Get form field data of agreement
Actions.Description: Retrieves data entered into the interactive form fields of the agreement.

Actions.Name: Get the status of an agreement [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get the status of an agreement instead.
This operation fetches all the current information of an agreement, like status.

Actions.Name: Get the status of an agreement
Actions.Description: This operation fetches all the current information of an agreement, like status.

Actions.Name: Get a list of all agreements (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation fetches the list of all agreements of the user.

Actions.Name: Get a list of all agreements
Actions.Description: This operation fetches the list of all agreements of the user.

Actions.Name: Get a list of all the document IDs from an agreement [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get a list of all the document IDs from an agreement instead.
This operation fetches the IDs of all documents and supporting documents of an agreement.

Actions.Name: Get a list of all the document IDs from an agreement
Actions.Description: This operation fetches the IDs of all documents and supporting documents of an agreement.

Actions.Name: Get a PDF of a signed agreement [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get a PDF of a signed agreement instead.
This operation fetches the PDF file stream of the combined or signed agreement. Note that the file stream should be stored with a filename ending in .pdf file extension.

Actions.Name: Get a PDF of a signed agreement
Actions.Description: This operation fetches the PDF file stream of the combined or signed agreement. Note that the file stream should be stored with a filename ending in .pdf file extension.

Actions.Name: Get a document from an agreement [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get a document from an agreement instead.
This operation fetches the file stream of a specific document of the agreement.

Actions.Name: Get a document from an agreement
Actions.Description: This operation fetches the file stream of a specific document of the agreement.

Actions.Name: Get a list of all library templates (Old) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation fetches the list of all documents stored as templates in the Adobe Sign library of the user.

Actions.Name: Get a list of all library templates
Actions.Description: This operation fetches the list of all documents stored as templates in the Adobe Sign library of the user.

Actions.Name: Retrieve the Signing URL
Actions.Description: This operation retrieves the URL for the e-sign page for the current signer(s) of an agreement.
